alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:17PM CDT until July 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Northeastern DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... Southeastern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 317 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kimball to near Huntland, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Bridgeport, Henagar, Stevenson, Hollywood, Skyline, Ider, Pisgah, Anderson and Hammondville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
